thread.title: Realty ONE Group Sponsoring Charities Across The Nation
thread.title_full: Realty ONE Group Sponsoring Charities Across The Nation - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Realty ONE Group Sponsoring Charities Across The Nation
text:
Realty ONE Group
IRVINE, Calif. , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Realty ONE Group, a full-service lifestyle real estate brokerage, is committed to making a difference across the nation via Realty ONE Group Cares. The company sponsored the Charity Poker Ride 4 "The House" on October 18 th , and they are excited to continue hosting charitable initiatives nationwide.
Realty Group ONE Cares spread hope to San Diego residents this past Sunday as they sponsored the Charity Poker Ride 4 "The House." The Realty ONE Group family gathered early for the 9:00am ride, which attracted bikers and autos from all over Southern California . Participants rode until 12:30pm , and the day continued with prizes, charity poker, and live musical performances. All proceeds were given directly to the Ronald McDonald House Charities of San Diego , Inc. The House provides food, shelter, support, and schooling to families with hospitalized children. When asked, the dynamic lifestyle brand's CEO, Kuba Jewgieniew , commented: "The message behind Realty ONE Group Cares is to appreciate the communities where we live, work, and play."
Realty ONE Group Cares is urging friends and family to join them as they continue supporting the Alzheimer's Association throughout the United States . Realty ONE Group is an official sponsor of the Walk to End Alzheimer's, and will be hosting events in California , Texas , Colorado , Pennsylvania , Arizona , and Nevada . Jewgieniew also shared ONE of the company's beliefs, "Giving back and spreading positivity is our ONE mission that effects change." This is more than just an event for the Realty ONE Group Cares team, it's a way for them to educate the community, spread awareness, and join others in fighting against Alzheimer's.
The company will be participating in the Las Vegas Light The Night Walk on November 7 th , for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society. The event is focused on commemorating those impacted by cancer, and advancing therapies and treatment methods for blood cancer patients. Realty ONE Group United is also excited to host a food drive at their office in Torrance, CA. Agents across the Pacific Region are encouraging everyone to get involved as they hand out bags to over 2,000 home owners. The bags will be packed with non-perishable foods and toiletries from the Foodbank of Southern California to support those less fortunate during Thanksgiving .
About Realty ONE Group : Founded in 2005, Realty ONE Group is a full-service residential real estate brokerage that has experienced tremendous growth while being 100% debt-free. Their dynamic lifestyle brand is built on the principle 'agent first, client first.' This focus has ignited change in the industry while their culture has created raving fans. The Realty ONE Group culture thrives on its belief that everyONE and everything matters, with a philosophy that everyONE has a voice â€“ waking up to win and making a difference together as ONE. This philosophy has landed them in Inc.'s 500 for seven consecutive years and fueled their expansion into 65 offices in 15 states with nearly 8,000 agents. www.RealtyONEGroup.com . Follow them on Twitter and Facebook
